website_summaries.verdict: A fluoride mouthwash that strengthens as well as whitens teeth.
cons: May cause slight burning during use

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: Not sure on whitening capabilities yet as my son has only used for a few days. Went ahead and gave three stars anyway. He did say it’s his new favorite mouthwash. Hope it whitens well also.
customer_reviews.author: Carie

customer_reviews.title: Black Tongue
customer_reviews.text: I used this and it made my tongue turn dark brown from the peroxide....Cleared up after 2 weeks when I stopped using it
customer_reviews.author: Hugh

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyday whitening
customer_reviews.text: Daily coffee drinker & red wine partake. Keeps stains from showing.
customer_reviews.author: shopaphobic

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! The taste, taste just like the white strips. It gets rid of bad breath. While your swishing it in your mouth you can feel it tingle. The only dislike is that it keeps the foamy texter in your mouth (I understand why that's for).
customer_reviews.author: Alexus kerttu

customer_reviews.title: Mouthwash
customer_reviews.text: My husband said that this mouthwash is the best. He said it makes his teeth white!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product whitens and freshens breath.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. Brush my teeth with it three times a day as does my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Bought it, used it, it broke. Cheap at a not cheap price.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Use it faithfully everyday. Works well to give you white teeth
customer_reviews.author: Linda Rose

customer_reviews.title: Product unsealed
customer_reviews.text: Product came in unsealed, says not eligible for return. Personally with all the videos going around I cannot use an unsealed product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: get after it, stinky breath! Get those butter teeth back to pearly white with the assisstance of this great mouthwash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works perfect
customer_reviews.text: This item was worth the price. It whitens my teeth perfectly. Whenever I use this product my teeth look like they were cleaned professionally.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Young

customer_reviews.title: Good price and product is worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This mouthwash tastes great and works well to whiten my teethe
customer_reviews.author: j g

customer_reviews.title: Favorite whitening and enamel strengthening mouth rinse
customer_reviews.text: Whitening and enamel strengthening- my favorite mouth rinse-hard to find
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

product_meta.title: Crest 3D Clean Mint Mouthwash, 32 Fluid Ounce
product_meta.description:
A smile that's stunningly white and beautifully strong. Why just whiten, when you can also strengthen? Crest 3D White Diamond Strong Mouthwash whitens, strengthens and refreshes bad breath. Its gentle foaming action formula safely whitens teeth* and helps strengthen weakened tooth enamel. Use it along with Crest 3D White Diamond Strong toothpaste and Oral-B 3D White Pro-Flex toothbrush, for a whiter and beautifully strong smile. *by removing surface stains




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Package Dimensions :10.31 x 4.49 x 2.76 inches; 2 Pounds
 * Date First Available :September 20, 2017
 * Manufacturer :Crest
 * ASIN :B075S6PRC3

 * 

 * Customer Reviews:4.6 out of 5 stars112 ratings A smile that's stunningly white and beautifully strong. Why just whiten, when you can also strengthen? Crest 3D White Diamond Strong Mouthwash whitens, strengthens and refreshes bad breath. Its gentle foaming action formula safely whitens teeth* and helps strengthen weakened tooth enamel. Use it along with Crest 3D White Diamond Strong toothpaste and Oral-B 3D White Pro-Flex toothbrush, for a whiter and beautifully strong smile. *by removing surface stains
